hook.text: If nothing matters, the audience won't care.

buildup.text: Stakes answer: what happens if the character fails?

discovery.text: High stakes create tension. Audiences lean in when stakes rise.

twist.text: Even small personal stakes work if they're authentic.

climax.text: No stakes means no story. Raise them early.

punchline.text: Raise the stakes. Make failure matter.

quiz.question: What do stakes do?
options: Create tension and make audiences care
